snippet: Defense lawyers have said that Abd al-Rahim al-Nashiri is suffering from post-traumatic stress because of C.I.A. torture.
abstract: Military tribunal case stemming from 2000 bombing of American destroyer Cole hits roadblock when prosecutors ask for mental health evaluation of defendant Abd al-Rahim al-Nashiri, citing defense lawyers' repeated assertions that he suffers from post-traumatic stress due to torture by Central Intelligence Agency.
lead_paragraph: Defense lawyers have said that Abd al-Rahim al-Nashiri is suffering from post-traumatic stress because of C.I.A. torture.

headline.seo: Mental Examination Ordered for Cole Bombing Suspect
headline.main: Mental Tests Are Ordered for Cole Bombing Suspect
headline.print_headline: Mental Tests Are Ordered For Cole Bombing Suspect

keywords.value: Human Rights and Human Rights Violations
keywords.name: subject
